examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Length: 49
Content-Type: application/json
Keep-Alive: 60

{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "success",
    "result": "Success"
}

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Length: 62
Content-Type: application/json
Keep-Alive: 60

{
    "code": 1000,
    "message": "系统错误"
}
